2007460.name: Boralaa
2007460.description:
What is Boralaa?

Boralaa is a turn-based Boss Rush Game with Souls-like elements. To unravel the mysteries of Boralaa, you must go through the Bosses. But the hero's life isn't easy, as you have to figure out how to defeat them as the turns go by. Zero help, just your attention and strategy!

Multiplayer

You can play with and against your friends. Or if you're a streamer, live with and against your community.

Lore Focused

Boralaa was created with the idea of lore first: the story was created first and the game was developed around it. We believe that a rich story is a huge source of entertainment, both inside and outside of the game. And we want to create an experience as good as other games have brought to us.

Lore

During a fateful day, a voice was heard by everyone. It didn't matter the place, race or age. Everyone in Boralaa listened in sync to the truth that changed the future of that people.

"Roar, adapt, curse, and bless."
"Surpass the abomination."
"Pain is Ordeal."

And so a light began to shine. An indication from the heavens informing the place. The location where everything will happen, with the prophecy set in stone. A counter displayed the number 365: the time until the first calamity appears.
